translation.home-left-text: Do you have any ideas? Let's bring them to life together!
translation.about-left-text: Hi, I'm Leonardo. I graduated from a 6-month, full-time intensive bootcamp at Boolean UK, where I dedicated over 1,000 hours to building my Full Stack Development skills with JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, Next.js, and TypeScript. I'm currently working as a Full Stack Software Developer, contributing by designing, building, and maintaining web applications with PHP, JavaScript, and React, as well as customizing and maintaining Shopify applications using Liquid. I also develop and deploy mobile applications using Expo and React Native.
translation.name: NAME
translation.omniloq-description: Encrypts every password, safely storing your accounts and logins. Create and save as many items you want. Available for desktop and mobile.
translation.wizard-description: Created for Wizard branches to manage and monitor their employees' work. Employees can register customers, and the company can easily access all data related to it.
